original_text: With the hoofs of his horses shall he tread down all thy streets: he shall slay thy people by the sword, and thy strong garrisons shall go down to the ground.
korean_text: 그가 그 말굽으로 네 모든 거리를 밟을 것이며 칼로 네 백성을 죽일 것이며 네 견고한 석상을 땅에 엎드러뜨릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: With the hoofs of his horses
shall he tread down all thy streets:
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 네 모든 거리를 짓밟을 것이니

sentences.original_text: he shall slay thy people by the sword,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 칼로 네 백성을 죽일 것이며

sentences.original_text: shall go down to the ground.
